name: tilos-radio-for-kaios
description: Play the live stream of Tilos Radio

scripts.dev: npm run-script copy-static-assets && parcel src/index.html --out-dir build
scripts.production: npm run-script copy-static-assets && parcel build src/index.html --out-dir build
scripts.copy-static-assets: mkdir -p build && cp src/manifest.webapp build && cp -r src/img/ico build
